00061 enum L4_irq_flow_type
00062 {
00063   L4_IRQ_F_NONE       = 0,     
00064   L4_IRQ_F_LEVEL      = 0x2,   
00065   L4_IRQ_F_EDGE       = 0x0,   
00066   L4_IRQ_F_POS        = 0x0,   
00067   L4_IRQ_F_NEG        = 0x4,   
00068   L4_IRQ_F_LEVEL_HIGH = 0x3,   
00069   L4_IRQ_F_LEVEL_LOW  = 0x7,   
00070   L4_IRQ_F_POS_EDGE   = 0x1,   
00071   L4_IRQ_F_NEG_EDGE   = 0x5,   
00072   L4_IRQ_F_MASK       = 0x7,   
00073 };

00080 enum L4_icu_opcode
00081 {
00087   L4_ICU_OP_BIND = 0,
00088 
00094   L4_ICU_OP_UNBIND = 1,
00095 
00101   L4_ICU_OP_INFO = 2,
00102 
00108   L4_ICU_OP_MSI_INFO = 3,
00109   L4_ICU_OP_UNMASK   = 4,
00110   L4_ICU_OP_MASK     = 5,
00111   L4_ICU_OP_SET_MODE = 6
00112 };
00113 
00114 enum L4_icu_ctl_op
00115 {
00116   L4_ICU_CTL_UNMASK = 0,
00117   L4_ICU_CTL_MASK   = 1
00118 };

00292 l4_icu_control_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, unsigned op,

00294                  l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW;

00296 
00297 /**************************************************************************
00298  * Implementations
00299  */
00300 
00301 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00302 l4_icu_bind_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_cap_idx_t irq,
00303               l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00304 {
00305   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00306   m->mr[0] = L4_ICU_OP_BIND;
00307   m->mr[1] = irqnum;
00308   m->mr[2] = l4_map_obj_control(0, 0);
00309   m->mr[3] = l4_obj_fpage(irq, 0, L4_FPAGE_RWX).raw;
00310   return l4_ipc_call(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 2, 1, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00311 }
00312 
00313 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00314 l4_icu_unbind_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_cap_idx_t irq,
00315                 l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00316 {
00317   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00318   m->mr[0] = L4_ICU_OP_UNBIND;
00319   m->mr[1] = irqnum;
00320   m->mr[2] = l4_map_obj_control(0, 0);
00321   m->mr[3] = l4_obj_fpage(irq, 0, L4_FPAGE_RWX).raw;
00322   return l4_ipc_call(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 2, 1, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00323 }
00324 
00325 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00326 l4_icu_info_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, l4_icu_info_t *info,
00327               l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00328 {
00329   l4_msgtag_t res;
00330   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00331   m->mr[0] = L4_ICU_OP_INFO;
00332   res = l4_ipc_call(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 1, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00333   if (!l4_msgtag_has_error(res) && l4_msgtag_label(res) >= 0
00334       && l4_msgtag_words(res) >= 3)
00335     {
00336       info->features = m->mr[0];
00337       info->nr_irqs  = m->mr[1];
00338       info->nr_msis  = m->mr[2];
00339     }
00340   return res;
00341 }
00342 
00343 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00344 l4_icu_msi_info_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_umword_t *msg,
00345                   l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00346 {
00347   l4_msgtag_t res;
00348   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00349   m->mr[0] = L4_ICU_OP_MSI_INFO;
00350   m->mr[1] = irqnum;
00351   res = l4_ipc_call(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 2, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00352   if (!l4_msgtag_has_error(res) && l4_msgtag_label(res) >= 0
00353       && l4_msgtag_words(res) >= 1)
00354     *msg = m->mr[0];
00355   return res;
00356 }
00357 
00358 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00359 l4_icu_set_mode_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_umword_t mode,
00360                   l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00361 {
00362   l4_msg_regs_t *mr = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00363   mr->mr[0] = L4_ICU_OP_SET_MODE;
00364   mr->mr[1] = irqnum;
00365   mr->mr[2] = mode;
00366   return l4_ipc_call(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 3, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00367 }
00368 
00369 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00370 l4_icu_control_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, unsigned op,
00371                  l4_umword_t *label, l4_timeout_t to,
00372                  l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00373 {
00374   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00375   m->mr[0] = L4_ICU_OP_UNMASK + op;
00376   m->mr[1] = irqnum;
00377   if (label)
00378     return l4_ipc_send_and_wait(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 2, 0, 0),
00379                                 label, to);
00380   else
00381     return l4_ipc_send(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 2, 0, 0), to);
00382 }
00383 
00384 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00385 l4_icu_mask_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_umword_t *label,
00386               l4_timeout_t to, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00387 { return l4_icu_control_u(icu, irqnum, L4_ICU_CTL_MASK, label, to, utcb); }
00388 
00389 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00390 l4_icu_unmask_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_umword_t *label,
00391                 l4_timeout_t to, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00392 { return l4_icu_control_u(icu, irqnum, L4_ICU_CTL_UNMASK, label, to, utcb); }

00423 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00424 l4_icu_set_mode(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_umword_t mode) L4_NOTHROW
00425 {
00426   return l4_icu_set_mode_u(icu, irqnum, mode, l4_utcb());
